title: Forecastable Metric
description: Standard metric names for delivery forecasts. Aligns with delivery-metrics.json vocabulary. Derived metrics (ctr, completion_rate) are excluded since they are calculated, not forecasted.

enumDescriptions.reach: Estimated unique reach. Units depend on measurement methodology (individuals, households, devices, cookies). See the product's delivery_measurement.provider for context.
enumDescriptions.spend: Estimated spend in the forecast currency
enumDescriptions.grps: Estimated Gross Rating Points (for CPP). When present, the demographic field on DeliveryForecast should specify the target demographic.
